description: What's the perfect ending to a long workout? Well, if you ask us, we'd have to say it's an orgasm! And that's exactly the conclusion TommyD & Paul Wagner come to after a getting back from a hardcore jog.From cock sucking, sweaty balls groping and ass pounding, this is another one of TommyD's kinky sex scene's we're sure you'll love.Enjoy!
title: The Bet
